TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerObject extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerObject Implements IDisposable, IEquatable(Of PeerObject), ISerializable

summary.span: 代表 PeerObject 類別的新執行個體，該執行個體將具有自動產生的 。

span.span: Represents a new instance of the PeerObject class with an auto-generated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks PeerObject 是執行階段資料，例如圖片、 憑證或特定的描述與特定應用程式相關聯。A PeerObject is run-time data, such as a picture, certificate, or a specific description that is associated with a particular application. 每個 PeerObject 執行個體的資料元素必須是小於或等於 16 KB 的大小。The data element of each PeerObject instance must be less than or equal to 16KB in size. 建構 PeerObject 的執行個體之後將它發行對等共同作業基礎結構，透過。After an instance of PeerObject is constructed it is published with the Peer Collaboration Infrastructure via . 建構此類別的執行個體，並設定適當的屬性，這個物件可能會傳遞至後和方法，以啟用/停用此物件探索和檢視的其他對等節點的發行。After constructing an instance of this class and setting the appropriate properties this object may be passed to the and methods to enable/disable the publishing of this object for other peers to discover and view. 註冊物件共同作業基礎結構的註冊資訊不會保存在登錄中之後，所產生的不同行為執行個體。After registering an object with the collaboration infrastructure the registration information is not persisted in the registry, resulting in different behavior from instances. 應用程式註冊此物件的存留期間，才有效物件註冊。The object registration is only valid for the lifetime duration of the application which registered the object. 不再需要或之前的應用程式結束時，應用程式應該取消註冊物件。Applications should unregister objects when they are no longer required or prior to application exit. 根據預設，如果執行個體超出範圍，會自動解除登錄 PeerObject。By default, a PeerObject is automatically unregistered if the instance goes out of scope. 變更 PeerObject 執行個體上的屬性，其登錄之後使用註冊方法不會更新 PeerObject 執行個體的註冊。Changing the properties on a PeerObject instance after it has been registered using the registration methods will not update the registration for the PeerObject instance. 若要有效地更新特定 PeerObject 執行個體的註冊，PeerObject 必須刪除並重新註冊以新的資訊。To effectively update the registration of a specific PeerObject instance, the PeerObject must be deleted and registered again with the new information.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後建構執行個體時，必須呼叫方法，若要發行具有對等共同作業基礎結構的物件。After the instance is constructed, the method must be called to publish the object with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
